item.title: Google Dorks
item.description: What Is Google Dorks? It is basically an advanced google search! I have included four types of google dorks in this collection: Google dorks for SQL injection, Google dorks for Local File Inclusion, Google dorks For open CCTV cams and Google dorks for sensitive information. Copy and paste the below google dorks on the search engine and have fun! Google Dorks For SQL Injection: •inurl:index.php?id= •inurl:trainers.php?id= •inurl:buy.php?category= •inurl:article.php?ID= •inurl:play_old.php?id= •inurl:declaration_more.php?decl_id=
